text:
5550. No, it was more likely to be an attempt to explain how
he met his fate.

5549. Henry
Baker, the gentleman with the bad hat and all the other
characteristics with which I have bored you.

5548. ‘Pray don’t trouble yourself to say it any longer than that,’ said
Alice.

5547. Swiftly I threw off my clothes, pulled on
those of a beggar, and put on my pigments and wig.

5546. He was an old friend
of McCarthy's, and, I may add, a great benefactor to him, for I
have learned that he gave him Hatherley Farm rent free.
